options.text: Create two App Registrations(1.Single Tenant and 2.MultiTenant) and provide their information in the below respective fields. Once the deployment is complete, you will see URL's in the output which needs to be added to the Redirect URI of your MultiTenant App Registration. Click on this box to watch/learn more about deploying this offer.

basics.name: webAppNamePrefix
basics.label: Web App Name Prefix
basics.toolTip: The resources(Appservices, SQL and etc) created during the deployment will be prefixed by this value.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: TenantID
basics.label: Tenant ID
basics.toolTip: Use the tenantId of the App Registration you created for the Single Tenant App Registration. You will also use value in your SaaS Offer technical configuration. Please see outputs for more information.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: ADApplicationID
basics.label: SingleTenant AppReg App(client) ID
basics.toolTip: This is the App(client) ID of the Single Tenant App registration. You will also use value in your SaaS Offer technical configuration. Please see outputs for more information.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: ADApplicationSecret
basics.toolTip: This is the secret created for the above(Single Tenant) App Registration

basics.name: ADMTApplicationID
basics.label: MultiTenant AppReg App(client) ID
basics.toolTip: This is the AppId of the MultiTenant App registration which supports the login of the WebApps created as part of this deployment. You will need to update the App Reg Redirect URIs after this deployment is complete. Please see the outpus once the deployment is complete for the Redirect URIs.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: PublisherAdminUsers
basics.label: Publisher Admin Users
basics.toolTip: This will be the Admin users of the Admin webapp as this is only for the publisher to manage the SaaS Offer. You can always add more people from the Admin portal UI

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: AadSqlAdminUsers
basics.label: AAD SQL Admin Users
basics.toolTip: The admin user Azure AD account for the SQL: server

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: AadAdminObjectId
basics.label: AAD SQL Admin Users AadAdminObjectId
basics.toolTip: User Object ID which you can get from your Azure AD

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.
